pages.text: Indeed, this was not the result I expected. It seems in absence of a target, the teleportation effect remains suspended in the Warp Solution until one ventures close enough.

I wonder if it might be possible to somehow $(4)capture this Effect$(0)? If it were, I could probably put it to good use. $(br2) Before I could do so, however, I would have to be able to get close $(4)without being subjected to the teleportation effect$(0). This is truly a mystery...
